verifyEmail.title: Enter the 6 digit code received by email

signup-form.accept-terms: By continuing, you accept our <0>Terms and Conditions</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

isNotVerifyEmailValid.title: Too Many Attempts
isNotVerifyEmailValid.description: You've attempted too many times to connect to your account. We've sent you a code by email to continue

isEmailUnconfirmed.title: Verify Your Email
isEmailUnconfirmed.description: To confirm your account, we have sent you a code to your email address.

reset-password.found-password: Found your password? Don't have an account yet?
reset-password.login-signup: <0>Log in</0> to your account or <1>Sign up.</1>
reset-password.email-sent: If this email address exists, you will receive an email with instructions about how to reset your password in a few minutes.
reset-password.reset-password-success: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
